  </script>

  <script>
   window.googletag = window.googletag || {cmd:[]};
      function setAdUnitDisplayStatus( display ){
        window.adUnits.forEach(function( element, i ) {
          if( element.code === window.adPositions.top.id ){
            window.adUnits[i].display = display;
          }
        });
      }

      window.googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        window.googletag.pubads().addEventListener( 'slotRequested', function(event) {
          if(!!window.trd && window.trd._debugs.ads.log) console.log( 'testad', event.slot.getSlotElementId(), event, window.adPositions.pushdown.id === event.slot.getSlotElementId(), window.adPositions.pushdown.id === event.slot.getSlotElementId());
          if( window.adPositions.pushdown.id === event.slot.getSlotElementId() ){
            window.adPositions.top.display = true;
            setAdUnitDisplayStatus( true );
            var top = document.getElementById( window.adPositions.top.id );
            top.classList.remove('my-3');
            top.classList.add('my-0');
          }
        });
        window.googletag.pubads().addEventListener( 'slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
          if(!!window.trd && window.trd._debugs.ads.log) console.log( 'testad', event.slot.getSlotElementId(), event, window.adPositions.pushdown.id === event.slot.getSlotElementId(), window.adPositions.pushdown.id === event.slot.getSlotElementId());
          if( event.isEmpty ){
            window.adPositions.top.display = false;
            setAdUnitDisplayStatus( false );
          }
          else if( window.adPositions.pushdown.id === event.slot.getSlotElementId() ){
            var top = document.getElementById( window.adPositions.top.id );
            top.parentElement.removeChild(top);
          }
        });
      });
  </script>
  <!-- GTM: DataLayer -->
  <script>
   window.dataLayer = (window.dataLayer || []);window.tp = (window.tp || []);window.trd = (window.trd || {user:{},meter:{},start_time: new Date('2021-03-22T01:13:40+00:00'),end_time: null});

      window.slug                = "";
      window.category            = "";
      window.tags                = "";
      window.issue               = "";
      window.slugLimited         = "";
      window.trd._uid_key        = '_trd_user_id';
      window.trd._uid_expire     = 365;
      window.trd._utp_key        = '_trd_user_type';
      window.trd._debugs         = JSON.parse( window.localStorage.getItem('_trd_debugs') ) || null;
      window.trd.standalone      = window.matchMedia('(display-mode: standalone)').matches;
      window.trd.piano_loggedin  = JSON.parse( window.localStorage.getItem( '_trd_piano_loggedin' ) ) || false;
      window.trd.user_type       = window.localStorage.getItem( window.trd._utp_key ) || 'anon';
      window.trd.site_url        = "https://therealdeal.com";
      window.trd.ticker_enable   = 1;
      window.trd.ad_enabled      = true;
      window.trd.ad_blocker      = false;
      window.trd.taboola_disable = false;
      window.trd.user.type  = window.localStorage.getItem( window.trd._utp_key ) || 'anon';
      window.trd.user.login = JSON.parse( window.localStorage.getItem( '_trd.user.login' ) ) || false;
            window.dataLayer.push({
        trd: {
          ad_enabled: window.trd.ad_enabled,
          ad_blocker: window.trd.ad_blocker,
          ticker_enable: window.trd.ticker_enable,
          post: null,
          taboola_disable: window.trd.taboola_disable,
          user_type: window.trd.user_type,
          piano_loggedin: window.trd.piano_loggedin
        }
      });
      const user_type = window.localStorage.getItem( window.trd._utp_key );
      window.tp.push(['setUsePianoIdUserProvider', true]);
      window.tp.push(["init", function(){
        // v1
        window.trd.piano_loggedin = tp.pianoId.isUserValid();
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd_piano_user', JSON.stringify(window.tp.pianoId.getUser(),null,0) );
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd_piano_loggedin', JSON.stringify(tp.pianoId.isUserValid(),null,0) );
        // v2
        window.dispatchEvent( new Event( 'trd.piano.ready' ) );
        window.trd.user.login = tp.pianoId.isUserValid();
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd.user', JSON.stringify(window.tp.pianoId.getUser(),null,0) );
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd.user.login', JSON.stringify(tp.pianoId.isUserValid(),null,0) );
        // set user type
        if( !window.trd.user.login ){
          window.trd.user_type = 'anon';
          window.trd.user.type = 'anon';
          window.localStorage.setItem( window.trd._utp_key, window.trd.user.type );
          window.dataLayer.push( { trd: { user_type: window.trd.user.type } } );
          window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.user.login.status', { detail: {
            status: false,
            user: null
          } } ) );
          // user type changed
          if( user_type !== window.trd.user_type ){
            window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.user.type.update', { detail: {
              new: window.trd.user_type,
              old: user_type
            } } ) );
          }
        } else {
          window.trd.user_type = 'lgdin';
          window.trd.user.type = 'lgdin';
          window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.user.login.status', { detail: {
            status: true,
            user: window.tp.pianoId.getUser()
          } } ) );
          // paid user check
          window.tp.api.callApi('/access/list', {}, function (result) {
            if (result.total){
              window.trd.user.access = result.data;
              for (let i=0,n=result.data.length; i<n; i++) {
                if (result.data[i].granted){
                  window.trd.user_type = 'paid';
                  window.trd.user.type = 'paid';
                  break;
                }
              }
            }
            if(user_type !== window.trd.user_type){
              window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.user.type.update', { detail: {
                new: window.trd.user_type,
                old: user_type
              } } ) );
            }
            window.localStorage.setItem( window.trd._utp_key, window.trd.user.type );
            window.dataLayer.push({trd:{user_type: window.trd.user.type}});
          });
        }
      }]);
      window.tp.push(["addHandler", "loginSuccess", function(){
        // v1
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd_piano_paywall_meter', null);
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd_piano_user', JSON.stringify(window.tp.pianoId.getUser(),null,0) );
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd_piano_loggedin', JSON.stringify(window.tp.pianoId.isUserValid(),null,0) );
        window.trd.piano_loggedin = tp.pianoId.isUserValid();
        window.trd.user_type = 'lgdin';
        // v2
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd.meter.paywall', null);
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd.user', JSON.stringify(window.tp.pianoId.getUser(),null,0) );
        window.localStorage.setItem( '_trd.user.login', JSON.stringify(window.tp.pianoId.isUserValid(),null,0) );
        window.trd.user.login = tp.pianoId.isUserValid();
        window.trd.user.type = 'lgdin';
        window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.user.login.status', { detail: {
          status: true,
          user: window.tp.pianoId.getUser()
        } } ) );
        // paid user check
        window.tp.api.callApi('/access/list', {}, function (result) {
            if (result.total){
              window.trd.user.access = result.data;
              for (let i=0,n=result.data.length; i<n; i++) {
                if (result.data[i].granted){
                  window.trd.user_type = 'paid';
                  window.trd.user.type = 'paid';
                  break;
                }
              }
            }
            if(user_type !== window.trd.user_type){
              window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.user.type.update', { detail: {
                new: window.trd.user_type,
                old: user_type
              } } ) );
            }
            window.localStorage.setItem( window.trd._utp_key, window.trd.user.type );
            window.dataLayer.push({trd:{user_type: window.trd.user.type}});
          });
      }]);
      window.tp.push([ "addHandler", "meterActive", function(data){
        if( "PaywallMeter" === data.meterName ){
          window.localStorage.setItem('_trd_piano_paywall_meter', JSON.stringify(data,null,0));
          window.localStorage.setItem('_trd.meter.paywall', JSON.stringify(data,null,0));
          window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.meter.paywall', { detail: data } ) );
        }
      }]);
      window.tp.push([ "addHandler", "meterExpired", function(data){
        if( "PaywallMeter" === data.meterName ){
          window.localStorage.setItem('_trd_piano_paywall_meter', JSON.stringify(data,null,0));
          window.localStorage.setItem('_trd.meter.paywall', JSON.stringify(data,null,0));
          window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( 'trd.meter.paywall', { detail: data } ) );
        }
      }]);
      window.addEventListener( 'load', () => {
        window.trd.end_time = new Date();
        window.dispatchEvent( new Event( 'trd.loaded' ) );
      });
  </script>
  <!-- /GTM: DataLayer -->

  </script>

  </script>

      <h3 class="trd-article-title">
       Ranking New York’s top residential brokerages of 2020
      </h3>
      <figure class="trd-article-image">
       <div class="trd-article-image-wrap">
        <img alt="From left: Compass’ Robert Reffkin; Corcoran Group's Pam Liebman; Brown Harris Stevens’ Bess Freedman; Douglas Elliman’s Howard Lorber; Sotheby’s International Realty’s Philip White (Photo-illustration by The Real Deal; photos via Getty Images)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s14.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/Top-Brokerages-Web-Art-1-1154x720.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="1154"/>
       </div>
       <figcaption class="trd-article-image-caption">
        From left: Compass’ Robert Reffkin; Corcoran Group's Pam Liebman; Brown Harris Stevens’ Bess Freedman; Douglas Elliman’s Howard Lorber; Sotheby’s International Realty’s Philip White (Photo-illustration by The Real Deal; photos via Getty Images)
       </figcaption>
      </figure>
      <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/ranking-new-yorks-top-residential-brokerages-of-2020/?utm_source=internal&amp;utm_medium=widget&amp;utm_campaign=feature_posts">
       Ranking New York’s top residential brokerages of 2020
      </a>
     </div>

       <div class="trd-article-image-wrap">

       </div>
      </figure>
      <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/landlords-shun-federal-rent-relief-over-program-requirements/?utm_source=internal&amp;utm_medium=widget&amp;utm_campaign=feature_posts">

       </div>
      </figure>
      <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/newmarks-acquisition-of-knotel-is-approved/?utm_source=internal&amp;utm_medium=widget&amp;utm_campaign=feature_posts">

   <section class="trd-container" id="hp-articles-1">
    <section class="trd-article-lists">
     <div class="trd-article-lists-content">
      <h3 class="trd-article-lists-content-title">
       <span>
        Latest News
       </span>
       <span class="trd-article-lists-content-line trd-color-bg">
       </span>
      </h3>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4231656">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="From left: Howard Lorber, Spencer Rascoff, Rob Speyer, and Steve Witkoff (Getty, Twitter)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s14.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210315070333-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         The definitive real estate SPAC tracker
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          By E.B. Solomont
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          February 19, 2021 09:00AM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         Blink and you’ll miss a new SPAC. With billions of dollars flowing into blank-check firms, a growing number of real estate players are targeting proptech. As an alternative to the traditional IPO, special-purpose acquisition...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/02/19/the-definitive-real-estate-spac-tracker/">
        The definitive real estate SPAC tracker
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243731">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="Cerberus Capital, Stonemont Financial form $1B domestic industrial venture" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210321044109-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
         <span class="trd-na-color">
          Weekend Edition
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Cerberus Capital, Stonemont Financial form $1B domestic industrial venture
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 21, 2021 02:00PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         Stonemont Financial Group and an affiliate of Cerberus Capital Management LP have formed a joint venture to invest in...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/21/cerberus-capital-stonemont-financial-form-1b-domestic-industrial-venture/">
        Cerberus Capital, Stonemont Financial form $1B domestic industrial venture
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243341">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="By some counts, applications from Americans to move to Tel Aviv more than doubled year-over-year in 2020. (Getty)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210318101526-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
         <span class="trd-na-color">
          Weekend Edition
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">

        </h4>

         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 21, 2021 12:00PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         The pandemic has sent some Americans with the means searching for bigger homes and more space. But some are also looking abroad, and an increasing number of Americans are buying homes in Tel Aviv,...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/21/more-americans-are-buying-homes-in-tel-aviv/">

     <div class="trd-article-lists-content">
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243569">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="Gil Dezer (Photos by Sonya Revell)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s13.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210319045418-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-sf-color-btn trd-sf-color-border">
          Miami
         </span>
         <span class="trd-sf-color">
          Issue
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         The Closing: Gil Dezer
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          By Hiten Samtani
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 02:30PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         Any screenwriter who pitched the character of Gil Dezer to a Hollywood studio would be laughed out of the room. A chain-smoking, gold chain-wearing, foul-mouthed developer who owns the Aston Martin DB5 James Bond...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/the-closing-gil-dezer/">
        The Closing: Gil Dezer
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243554">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="217 East Houston Street (Photos via Halstead, Team Dustizeff/Wikimedia)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s13.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/ft-Lower-East-Side-home-of-Mercury-Lounge-for-sale-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Lower East Side home of Mercury Lounge for sale
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 01:45PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         The Lower East Side building that’s home to the popular nightclub Mercury Lounge is for sale. The mixed-use tenement...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/lower-east-side-home-of-mercury-lounge-for-sale/">
        Lower East Side home of Mercury Lounge for sale
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243515">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="Rudolph Valentino and his former estate, Falcon Lair (Getty, Hilton &amp; Hyland)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s13.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210319034110-250x178.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-la-color-btn trd-la-color-border">
          Los Angeles
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Rudolph Valentino’s former Beverly Hills estate sells for $15M
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 01:00PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         A four-acre Beverly Hills estate that once belonged to the golden boy of Hollywood’s early Golden Age is ready...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/rudolph-valentinos-former-beverly-hills-estate-sells-for-15m/">
        Rudolph Valentino’s former Beverly Hills estate sells for $15M
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243527">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="(iStock/Illustration by Kevin Rebong for The Real Deal)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s12.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210319042920-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Landlords shun federal rent relief over program requirements
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 12:30PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         The federal government wants to give landlords and tenants $50 billion to help keep renters in their homes —...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/landlords-shun-federal-rent-relief-over-program-requirements/">
        Landlords shun federal rent relief over program requirements
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243473">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="A Walgreens and Duane Reade location at 322 8th Ave (Google Maps)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/493-Walgreens-and-Duane-Reade-to-sublease-16-combined-locations-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Walgreens, Duane Reade to sublease 16 stores
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          By Sasha Jones
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 12:25PM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         Walgreens and Duane Reade, once fixtures of many New York City streets, are packing up even more of their...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/walgreens-duane-reade-to-sublease-16-stores/">
        Walgreens, Duane Reade to sublease 16 stores
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243488">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="(iStock/Illustration by Kevin Rebong for The Real Deal)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s12.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210319030735-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Investors pile into house-flipping
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 11:15AM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         The number of investors backing house-flippers jumped 50 percent in two months, as low interest rates continue to drive the hunt for higher profits. Research firm Attom Data Solutions found that the gross earnings...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/investors-pile-into-house-flipping/">
        Investors pile into house-flipping
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243353">
       <div class="trd-article-image">

         <img alt="Steven Croman (Getty, Supreme Court of the State of New York/Illustration by Alexis Manrodt for The Real Deal)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s14.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/493-Croman-gets-extra-time-to-pay-tenants-2M-after-citing-Covid-related-financial-hardship-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Croman gets until 2023 to pay final $2M in tenant restitution
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          By Kathryn Brenzel
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 10:30AM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         Landlord Steve Croman has bought himself extra time to pay off the remaining $2 million he owes tenants, thanks...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/croman-gets-until-2023-to-pay-final-2m-in-tenant-restitution/">

       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243449">
       <div class="trd-article-image">

         <img alt="Knotel CEO Amol Sarva and Newmark CEO Barry Gosin (Sarva via Sasha Maslov; Gosin via Newmark)

        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Newmark’s acquisition of Knotel is approved
        </h4>

         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 10:05AM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         A bankruptcy court has approved the sale of flex-office provider Knotel to brokerage Newmark. Newmark officials said they expected...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/newmarks-acquisition-of-knotel-is-approved/">
        Newmark’s acquisition of Knotel is approved
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list trd-video" id="article-4243434">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="TRD Tips: Bradley Tusk gives a crash course on SPACs" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210319012913-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         TRD Tips: Bradley Tusk gives a crash course on SPACs
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 09:30AM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         With big-name real estate investors racing to found special-purpose acquisition companies, you may find yourself wondering: What exactly is...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/trd-tips-bradley-tusk-gives-a-crash-course-on-spacs/">
        TRD Tips: Bradley Tusk gives a crash course on SPACs
       </a>
      </article>
      <article class="trd-article trd-article-list" id="article-4243413">
       <div class="trd-article-image">
        <span class="trd-article-image-wrap">
         <img alt="NewLake CEO Anthony Coniglio (NewLake, iStock)" class="lazyload" data-src="https://s12.therealdeal.com/trd/up/2021/03/crosspost-20210319011257-250x179.jpg" height="auto" loading="lazy" src="https://s11.therealdeal.com/trd/pl/trd-core/assets/images/placeholder.svg" width="250"/>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div class="trd-article-body flex-grow-1">
        <div class="trd-article-sources">
         <span class="trd-na-color-btn trd-na-color-border">
          National
         </span>
        </div>
        <h4 class="trd-article-title">
         Two cannabis REITs form joint venture
        </h4>
        <div class="trd-article-meta trd-article-author-date">
         <span class="author">
          TRD Staff
         </span>
         <span class="break">
          |
         </span>
         <span class="date">
          March 19, 2021 09:10AM
         </span>
        </div>
        <p class="trd-article-excerpt">
         As cannabis-focused real estate blossoms, two real estate firms focused on the sector will now be rolled into one. The REITs, NewLake Capital Partners Inc. and GreenAcreage Real Estate Corp., will merge to form...
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="trd-article-link" href="https://therealdeal.com/2021/03/19/two-cannabis-reits-form-joint-venture/">
        Two cannabis REITs form joint venture
       </a>
      </article>

    Privacy &amp; Cookies Policy
   </span>
  </div>
  <div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="cliSettingsPopup" class="cli-modal" data-nosnippet="true" id="cliSettingsPopup" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
   <div class="cli-modal-dialog" role="document">
    <div class="cli-modal-content cli-bar-popup">
     <button class="cli-modal-close" id="cliModalClose" type="button">
      <svg class="" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
       <path d="M19 6.41l-1.41-1.41-5.59 5.59-5.59-5.59-1.41 1.41 5.59 5.59-5.59 5.59 1.41 1.41 5.59-5.59 5.59 5.59 1.41-1.41-5.59-5.59z">
       </path>
       <path d="M0 0h24v24h-24z" fill="none">
       </path>
      </svg>
      <span class="wt-cli-sr-only">
       Close
      </span>
     </button>
     <div class="cli-modal-body">
      <div class="cli-container-fluid cli-tab-container">
       <div class="cli-row">
        <div class="cli-col-12 cli-align-items-stretch cli-px-0">
         <div class="cli-privacy-overview">
          <h4>
           Privacy Overview
          </h4>
          <div class="cli-privacy-content">
           <div class="cli-privacy-content-text">
            This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these cookies, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may have an effect on your browsing experience.
           </div>
          </div>
          <a class="cli-privacy-readmore" data-readless-text="Show less" data-readmore-text="Show more" role="button" tabindex="0">
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="cli-col-12 cli-align-items-stretch cli-px-0 cli-tab-section-container">
         <div class="cli-tab-section">
          <div class="cli-tab-header">
           <a class="cli-nav-link cli-settings-mobile" data-target="necessary" data-toggle="cli-toggle-tab" role="button" tabindex="0">
            Necessary
           </a>
           <div class="wt-cli-necessary-checkbox">
            <input checked="checked" class="cli-user-preference-checkbox" data-id="checkbox-necessary" id="wt-cli-checkbox-necessary" type="checkbox"/>
            <label class="form-check-label" for="wt-cli-checkbox-necessary">
             Necessary
            </label>
           </div>
           <span class="cli-necessary-caption">
            Always Enabled
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="cli-tab-content">
           <div class="cli-tab-pane cli-fade" data-id="necessary">
            <p>
             Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="cli-tab-section">
          <div class="cli-tab-header">
           <a class="cli-nav-link cli-settings-mobile" data-target="non-necessary" data-toggle="cli-toggle-tab" role="button" tabindex="0">
            Non-necessary
           </a>
           <div class="cli-switch">
            <input checked="checked" class="cli-user-preference-checkbox" data-id="checkbox-non-necessary" id="wt-cli-checkbox-non-necessary" type="checkbox"/>
            <label class="cli-slider" data-cli-disable="Disabled" data-cli-enable="Enabled" for="wt-cli-checkbox-non-necessary">
             <span class="wt-cli-sr-only">
              Non-necessary
             </span>
            </label>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="cli-tab-content">
           <div class="cli-tab-pane cli-fade" data-id="non-necessary">
            <p>
             Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

  <section class="newsletter-slide">
   <div class="newsletter-slide-container">
    <button class="newsletter-slide-close-btn">
     <i class="fa fa-close fa-times">
     </i>
    </button>
    <div class="newsletter-form-title h2">
     REAL NEWS, REAL DEALS DELIVERED DIRECTLY TO YOU
    </div>
    <p>
     <em>
      The
      <span class="newsletter-logo-color">
       Real
      </span>
      Deal's
     </em>
     newsletters give you the latest scoops, fresh headlines, marketing data, and things to know within the industry.
    </p>
    <style type="text/css">
     :root{font-family:'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-weight:400;box-sizing:border-box}body.newsletter{margin-top:0;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.newsletter main{padding:16px 0;flex:1 0 auto;font-size:16px;font-family:'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-weight:400;background-color:#000;color:#fff}.newsletter main *{box-sizing:border-box}@media only screen and (min-width:960px){.newsletter main{background-size:cover;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-attachment:scroll;background-position:center;background-image:url(/wp-content/themes/therealdeal/assets/images/newsletter-bg-2000x903.jpg)}}.newsletter-content h1{text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:32px;margin-top:32px;margin-bottom:16px;font-family:'Oswald','Open Sans',sans-serif;font-weight:400}.newsletter-content p{text-align:center;font-family:inherit;font-size:inherit}.newsletter-content h1+p{font-size:19.2px;margin:0 auto}@media only screen and (min-width:782px){.newsletter-content h1{font-size:36.8px}.newsletter-content p{font-size:24px;max-width:645px;margin:0 auto}}@media only screen and (min-width:960px){.newsletter-content h1{font-size:40px}.newsletter-content p{font-size:25.6px;max-width:645px;margin:0 auto}}@media only screen and (min-width:1280px){.newsletter-content h1{font-size:48px}.newsletter-content p{font-size:32px;max-width:645px;margin:0 auto}}.newsletter .trd-header{margin-bottom:0}.newsletter .container{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto}@media only screen and (min-width:425px){.page.newsletter-form .checkboxes{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.page.newsletter-form .checkbox-field{width:50%}.page.newsletter-form .checkbox-field#a1697a3052{order:2;width:100%}}@media only screen and (min-width:782px){.page.newsletter-form .fields{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.page.newsletter-form .fields .input-field{width:50%}.page.newsletter-form .fields (min-width:960px){.page .newsletter-form-container{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:stretch}.page .newsletter-form-footer{margin-top:32px}.page.newsletter-form .fields,.page.newsletter-form .interests{width:40%;margin:0}.page.newsletter-form .break{height:auto;width:1px;margin:0;display:block}.page.newsletter-form .fields{flex-wrap:nowrap;flex-direction:column}.page.newsletter-form .fields .input-field{width:auto}.page.newsletter-form .fields .input-field+.input-field{margin-top:24px}.page.newsletter-form .fields .input-field:nth-child(even){padding-left:0}.page.newsletter-form .fields .break{display:none}}
/*# sourceMappingURL=newsletter.min.css.map */
    </style>
    <form action="" class="newsletter-form slide" method="post">
     <div class="newsletter-form-container">
      <div class="newsletter-form-col fields">
       <div class="input-field">

         Email Address
        </label>

       </div>

        </label>

       </div>

        </label>
        <input id="newsletter_lastname" name="lastname" type="text" value=""/>
       </div>
       <div class="input-field">
        <label for="newsletter_company">
         Company
        </label>
        <input id="newsletter_company" name="company" type="text" value=""/>
       </div>
       <div class="break">
       </div>
       <div class="newsletter-form-footer">
        <button class="newsletter-form-button newsletter-form-submit" type="submit">
         Subscribe
        </button>
        <div class="newsletter-form-success">
         You are now subscribed.
        </div>
        <div class="newsletter-form-error">
         We are having some technical difficulties. Try again later.
        </div>
        <p class="newsletter-form-agree">
         By clicking
         <em>
          Subscribe
         </em>
         you agree to our
         <a href="/privacy-policy/" target="_blank">
          Privacy Policy
         </a>
         .
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="newsletter-form-col break">
      </div>
      <div class="newsletter-form-col interests">
       <div class="h4">
        Daily
       </div>
       <p>
        Round-up of top news and topics for each of the following cities:
       </p>
       <div class="checkboxes">
        <div class="checkbox-field" id="newyorkdaily">
         <input checked="" id="newsletter_newyorkdaily" name="New York Daily" type="checkbox" value="1"/>
         <label for="newsletter_newyorkdaily">
          New York
         </label>
        </div>
        <div class="checkbox-field" id="losangelesdaily">
         <input checked="" id="newsletter_losangelesdaily" name="Los Angeles Daily" type="checkbox" value="1"/>
         <label for="newsletter_losangelesdaily">
          Los Angeles
         </label>
        </div>
